channel.title: Friends Kinnera War on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Friends Kinnera War on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: JJ.. Oh yea
item.description: So the other day I was on TV. Well not really.. maybe.. I went to a Filming of the Jenny Jones show. It was a riot. i laughed very very hard. Kinnera somehow got tickets, and at first i didn’t know what to think. But i was immediatly calmed when someguy yelled “slut” randomly in the beginning. I knew i was among friends. WHat a piece of work most of the people were.
